item.title: Geometry: Left Fist Rule
item.description:
WHY: Why use left-fist rule?

  • I do not want to put down my pen when I am thinking and writing.
  • The thumb is in the fist which is more lively to some situation.

WHAT: What is the left-fist rule?

  1. Raise your left fist with thumb in your palm
  2. Point your rest four fingers to $x$ direction
  3. Scroll your fingers to $y$ direction to form a fist
  4. the direction of your thumb is $z$ direction
